Draft: Number Three Factor - All Culture is work

/ > notes > 2024


To be released: October 17th, 2026

Update 10/7/2024, 10/9/2024 Focusing on seeing (and appropriatey to NLNM if necessary awakening) conscience and other positive characteristics that dominate over instinctual behavior in humans (seeing relatable, good persons, or if that's too much to think about without practice, to begin with, just seeing a human face) under stressful conditions can be a difficult and taxing task that requires discipline and persistence. Being aware of the pull of Earth and the air you breathe may take much sustained practice. Yet the two of them may not be enough to ensure enforcement of NLNM by all opposing forces. NLNM combatants must also respect the time and work of many generations of peoples who built their cultures, no matter how foreign in nature, primitive or out of touch those cultures appear to be.

Pre and post battle rituals or customs that build the respect for these three factors may do much good for enforcing NLNM outcomes.
